title: Open Source
description: Get started by contributing to open source projects with a wide range of technology stack - Such as React

title: Designing Sessions
description: Join our sprint based design sessions on Discord. Learn about UX Design, UI Design/Dev, Design Systems Engineering, Graphic Design and building some cool stuff

title: Hackathons with MLH
description: We actively participate in MLH organized hackathons and events. Join HEKORS guild and learn through building cool projects - Build your project portfolio

title: Offline Meetups
description: Join us in offline meetups where we connect in person with all the community members. Checkout for upcoming offline meetups.
